meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by my first-year geography course and unsure if I can keep up
meeting_request.description: Hi, I'm Nancy, a first-year student in geography. I’ve taken a rigorous introductory course this semester and already feel like I’m behind. Some of the readings are really challenging, and the lectures are long and dense. I’m struggling to understand concepts even partially, and I’m starting to feel overwhelmed. I’m also feeling a bit burned out from school already, and I’m not sure if I can keep up this level of academic engagement. I’m not in any particularly tight academic bind yet, but I’m worried that I’m going to fall behind and feel really bad if I don't keep up.
